title: 構造体のポインタ 1
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:

<color=#ffd700>}</color>TEST;

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> argc,<color=#358cd6>char</color>* argv<color=#ffd700>[</color><color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  TEST ex1 = <color=#ffd700>{</color>12,<color=#ce9178>'a'</color><color=#ffd700>}</color>;

  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>,<color=#ff0000>???</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
